items.title: Paint Dewdrops in Watercolor
items.headline: Learn the easy way to paint realistic 3D water droplets on flowers, to add a WOW factor to your paintings
objectives_summary: Learn how to add sparkle and wow factor to your paintings by adding a dewdrop or two using watercolour. These dewdrops will have a real wow factor because they look so real and 3D
Learn step by step how to make hard edges and soft edges, gradients and washes - the 4 core skills of watercolour.
Find out how to lift your paintings of flowers to another level by adding a three dimensional water droplet into your painting.
